title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the Eastern Conference Finals. What was it that pushed the Celtics to victory? Charles Barkley calls in to preview the Finals and share what advice he’d give Zion. And Robert Horry discuss the Lakers hiring of Darvin Ham.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
